text: De, Jonon muñuŋgumbaŋɨk yiŋɨmeve. Kaukatɨk balañju maŋamɨk ga bumŋɨlali wun. Jonon kavik yikali yikali galaveve, “Juñjuŋama anafak yive suwɨ. Suwɨndi ŋɨn be maŋamɨk ga bumbapa. Kavik pavɨndi Gotɨn bikɨk yaka wulu bikɨk safumbatɨk mandɨve ka sivɨlapayi. Valambapa.” Jonon muñuŋgumbaŋɨk yiŋɨmeve
